PreToolUse.matcher: tool == "Bash" && tool_input.command matches "(npm run dev|pnpm( run)? dev|yarn dev|bun run dev)"

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
input=$(cat)
cmd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.command // ""')

# Block dev servers that aren't run in tmux
echo '[Hook] 已拦截: 开发服务器必须在 tmux 中运行以确保日志访问' >&2
echo '[Hook] 请改用此命令:' >&2
echo "[Hook] tmux new-session -d -s dev 'npm run dev'" >&2
echo '[Hook] 然后: tmux attach -t dev' >&2
exit 1

PreToolUse.description: 拦截 tmux 外的开发服务器 - 确保你可以访问日志

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
input=$(cat)
if [ -z "$TMUX" ]; then
  echo '[Hook] 建议在 tmux 中运行以确保持久化' >&2
  echo '[Hook] tmux new -s dev  |  tmux attach -t dev' >&2
fi
echo "$input"

PreToolUse.description: 提醒对长时间运行的命令使用 tmux

hooks.command:

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Block creation of unnecessary documentation files
input=$(cat)
file_path=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""')

if [[ "$file_path" =~ \.(md|txt)$ ]] && [[ ! "$file_path" =~ (README|CLAUDE|AGENTS|CONTRIBUTING)\.md$ ]]; then
  echo "[Hook] 已拦截: 创建不必要的文档文件" >&2
  echo "[Hook] 文件: $file_path" >&2
  echo "[Hook] 请使用 README.md 统一文档" >&2
  exit 1
fi

echo "$input"

PreToolUse.description: 拦截创建随意的 .md 文件 - 保持文档集中
在逻辑间隔建议手动压缩

PreCompact.description: 在上下文压缩前保存状态

SessionStart.description: 在新会话加载先前的上下文

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Auto-detect PR creation and log useful info
input=$(cat)
cmd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.command')

if echo "$cmd" | grep -qE 'gh pr create'; then
  output=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_output.output // ""')
  pr_url=$(echo "$output" | grep -oE 'https://github.com/[^/]+/[^/]+/pull/[0-9]+')
  
  if [ -n "$pr_url" ]; then
    echo "[Hook] PR 已创建: $pr_url" >&2
    echo "[Hook] 正在检查 GitHub Actions 状态..." >&2
    repo=$(echo "$pr_url" | sed -E 's|https://github.com/([^/]+/[^/]+)/pull/[0-9]+|\1|')
    pr_num=$(echo "$pr_url" | sed -E 's|.*/pull/([0-9]+)|\1|')
    echo "[Hook] 审查 PR: gh pr review $pr_num --repo $repo" >&2
  fi
fi

echo "$input"

PostToolUse.description: PR 创建后记录 URL 并提供审查命令

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Auto-format with Prettier after editing JS/TS files
input=$(cat)
file_path=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""')

if [ -n "$file_path" ] && [ -f "$file_path" ]; then
  if command -v prettier >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    prettier --write "$file_path" 2>&1 | head -5 >&2
  fi
fi

echo "$input"

PostToolUse.description: 编辑后使用 Prettier 自动格式化 JS/TS 文件

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Run TypeScript check after editing TS files
input=$(cat)
file_path=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""')

if [ -n "$file_path" ] && [ -f "$file_path" ]; then
  dir=$(dirname "$file_path")
  project_root="$dir"
  while [ "$project_root" != "/" ] && [ ! -f "$project_root/package.json" ]; do
    project_root=$(dirname "$project_root")
  done
  
  if [ -f "$project_root/tsconfig.json" ]; then
    cd "$project_root" && npx tsc --noEmit --pretty false 2>&1 | grep "$file_path" | head -10 >&2 || true
  fi
fi

echo "$input"

PostToolUse.description: 编辑 .ts/.tsx 文件后运行 TypeScript 检查

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Warn about console.log in edited files
input=$(cat)
file_path=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""')

if [ -n "$file_path" ] && [ -f "$file_path" ]; then
  console_logs=$(grep -n "console\\.log" "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true)
  
  if [ -n "$console_logs" ]; then
    echo "[Hook] 警告: 在 $file_path 中发现 console.log" >&2
    echo "$console_logs" | head -5 >&2
    echo "[Hook] 提交前请移除 console.log" >&2
  fi
fi

echo "$input"

PostToolUse.description: 编辑后警告有关 console.log 语句

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Final check for console.logs in modified files
input=$(cat)

if git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then
  modified_files=$(git diff --name-only HEAD 2>/dev/null | grep -E '\.(ts|tsx|js|jsx)$' || true)
  
  if [ -n "$modified_files" ]; then
    has_console=false
    while IFS= read -r file; do
      if [ -f "$file" ]; then
        if grep -q "console\.log" "$file" 2>/dev/null; then
          echo "[Hook] 警告: 在 $file 中发现 console.log" >&2
          has_console=true
        fi
      fi
    done <<< "$modified_files"
    
    if [ "$has_console" = true ]; then
      echo "[Hook] 提交前请移除 console.log 语句" >&2
    fi
  fi
fi

echo "$input"

Stop.description: 会话结束前对修改文件中的 console.log 进行最终审计
结束时持久化会话状态
